colour.models.rgb.dataset.alexa_wide_gamut_rgb Module¶

ALEXA Wide Gamut RGB Colourspace¶

Defines the ALEXA Wide Gamut RGB colourspace:

  • ALEXA_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]ARRI. (2012). ALEXA - Log C Curve - Usage in VFX. Retrieved from http://www.arri.com/?eID=registration&file_uid=8026
colour.models.rgb.dataset.alexa_wide_gamut_rgb.ALEXA_WIDE_GAMUT_RGB_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.684 , 0.313 ], [ 0.221 , 0.848 ], [ 0.0861, -0.102 ]])¶

ALEXA Wide Gamut RGB colourspace primaries.
